      • rejectedSelectivePublishing

        public void rejectedSelectivePublishing()
                                 throws org.cesecore.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                        org.ejbca.core.model.ca.publisher.PublisherException
        Tests that willPublishCertificate and storeCertificate correctly filters certificates by certificate status. This test tests that certificates that should NOT be published are not published.
        Throws:
        org.cesecore.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException - Fail

      • storeCrl

        public void storeCrl()
              throws org.ejbca.core.model.ca.publisher.PublisherException,
                     org.cesecore.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException
        Tests the storeCrl using a mock PublisherSession. It tests with non-existing publisher IDs, which should never happen, but we should not crash if it happens.
        Throws:
        org.ejbca.core.model.ca.publisher.PublisherException - Fail
        org.cesecore.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException - Fail
